column1: Smoque BBQ////The nice-sized brisket and pulled pork sandwiches and platters have a terrific depth of flavor
column2: with that smoky tang that takes you to the Carolinas
column4: or someplace down there. Individual ramekins of cornbread and mac and cheese are noteworthy complements
column5: and the BBQ beans should not be missed. They do a nice salad that you can add chicken to
column6: and they serve it with a creamy ranch dressing that makes it very rich. I think I would add a few drops of sauce to that dressing for a bit more piquancy. All in all a lovely experience
column7: comforting and reasonably priced. Get in there!
